info.name: Mega Glalie Pokemon Showdown Style
info.description: An Mega Glalie Pokemon Showdown style. If you have any question, you can find me at servers such as origin.
info.additionalInfo:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown. 
Updates:

    28ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - fixed the rainbow menugroup buttons.

    29ᵗʰ June 2015:
      - Added the gradients for chrome.

    14ᵗʰ December 2015:
      - fix background.
      - completely updated
